text: America's Old-Time Country Music Hall Of Fame is managed by the National Traditional Country Music Association, and located at the Pioneer Music Museum in Anita, Iowa, United States. The award was established in 1976. ==See also== * List of music museums ==References== Category:Halls of fame in Iowa Category:Country music awards Category:Awards established in 1976 Category:Museums in Cass County, Iowa Category:American country music
title: America's Old-Time Country Music Hall Of Fame
